transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Hello? Hello? Yes. Yeah, I. I just received a call from this number, so I thought I would. Is it. Is it Omesha that I'm speaking with? Yes, yes, yes, of the site calling you from abba. Student. Right. Omission. Just wanted to confirm. I can see that you're looking to book a student accommodation in London. Am I correct? Yeah. So have you seen the properties? I can see that you have seen Static Wasteland, House and one of the one more property. Correct. Yeah. So just wanted to confirm if you have shortlisted anything or like you will be needing more options. I think I will be needing more options. I mean, I really like the Dawn Greta House, but I'm still looking if I can find something under the budget. What's the budget that you have in your mind and the university name? Hello, Am I audible? Yes, yes, you are. I'm just speaking like, what kind of budget that you'll be looking for? Something around £250 per week. 250. And what's the university that you'll be going for? Bartlet, but it will be the E campus. Which university is it? Bartlett. Ucl. Bartlett. Okay. Ucl. University of London. And what kind of room preference that you have in your mind? I mean, I'm okay. I like, I would need a private bedroom, but I'm okay to share everything else. Kitchen, bathroom, whatever. So in that case, aesthetic ways will be a perfect fit for you because the request is well within the budget of yours. And along with that, you'll be able to see that it's a private room, the washroom and the kitchen or is on sharing basis in Sarah quiz. So according to my opinion, it can be a good property. Meanwhile, I'll do one thing here. I'll share you some more options regarding the sense and get back to you. Okay, sure. Yeah. Which one did you mention just now? Sarique Slen House. I will share it to you on your WhatsApp straight away for this property. All right? Yeah. Okay. Yes, sir, I think I have different number for my WhatsApp. I'm not sure if you have it. Can you please repeat that? I didn't get that part. I said I have a different number for my WhatsApp. Can I just give that to you? Yeah, please. So, like, I. I can see this number is also available on WhatsApp. So. So, like, I just registered it just for the sake of Amber. But I. I mean, this is not my WhatsApp number. Can I. Is that okay? Please type it in the WhatsApp chat and then I'll be able to text you, proceed forward. Okay. Sure. Okay. Okay. If. If I have any queries, I. I will talk to you on that number. Okay. All right. All right. Okay. Done. Yeah. Thank you. Yeah.
